title: Supp items
body:
Hello to all the supp mains out there, Just wanting to see what every ones building ATM and what the current best supp items are.
I like a few of the oldys 
Frozen heart 
Zeks(at times)
Adaptive helm is defs great.

replies.body:
Hey Summoner!!

If you're gonna play AP utility supports like Nami/Karma/Janna/Lulu and Sona

I'd suggest rushing ardent! I love the AP and bonus healing and shield power it gives. 

If you're doing REALLY WELL or your team is, get an early dark seal to get some juicy stacks to boost your AP. 

Then I like to get redemption straight after that, into either crucible or locket.

I mostly play tank supps like leo/thresh/naut
aside from them i play nami/janna

On my tanks - Core
Locket is a must, often buy the eye of equinox

Tanks - Stituational
Frozen heart - High AS
Thornmail - High dmg/AS
Randuins - High Crit
Visage - AP comps

Bootwise, mercs or tabi depending on comp

On my AP supps - Core
Morellos - Into a healing comp (or i take ignite)
Redemption is a frequent buy
Im beginning to love the Ardent Censor on my shielders

Ap - Situational
Locket
Abyssal - high ap comp
Zhoynas - AD comp
Randuins into crit

Healers and Shielders - Core
Redemption, Censor, Talisman/Eye of watchers (depending on if i want dmg)

Situational
Randuins - Crit
Frozen heart - high AS

Even when playing as a utility support, I like to build tanky items to actually be helpful to my ADC rather than be just as squishy as them (watching Zed ulting a 200 armour Nami/Rakan is just an absolute joy). I really like Knight's Vow, even more than Redemption. It might not be as strong as Locket, but I still feel like it helps me protect my carry, and that healing it gives based off your bound ally's attacks has saved me from Ignite damage at least a few times. That being said though, I'd love to try out the new Zeke's sometime on Rakan or Leona, but I haven't really played either one often enough lately to get the chance.
